titles.title: J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017
J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017
J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017
J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017
J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017
To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of certain hydroelectric projects.
J. Bennett Johnston Waterway Hydropower Extension Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 115-176.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 120.

action.text: Mr. Upton moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2457.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 402 - 1 (Roll no. 301).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
